topic.title: Why the Jews hate Syria and Assad
topic.body:
Why the Jews hate Syria and Assad
- Syriaâ€™s Central Bank is state-owned and state-controlled and not Jewish controlled.

- Syria has banned genetically modified seeds, created by Jews to harm Gentiles.
